title: Both Sides Assess What's Been Lost In Gaza â€” And Consider A Way Forward
teaser: Israel says it destroyed tunnels built and used by Hamas, but Hamas appears to have forced Israel at least to negotiate over more freedom of movement for Gazans. And, as Daniel Estrin reports, a month of violence has left vast personal tragedy.
